Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • chgkeywrd - Change keywords in a header file.
  • eheader - Interactively edit an image header.
  • groupmod - Add/delete group parameters from multigroup data.
  • hcheck - Check image header keywords.
  • hdiff - Display the differences between two image headers.
  • imagree - Change header keywords to agree with the image name.
  • iminfo - Print an instrument-specific header for a list of GEIS images
  • or a general header for a list of IRAF images.
  • imkeyname - Rename an image using a name from a header keyword.
  • stfhistory - Add history records to an STSDAS image header.

  • Type "help headers" for more information about the 'headers' package.
